content: simply stripes is an easy and fast baby/lap blanket where you can have lots of fun playing around with color this pattern and sample was knit up for knitwit yarn shop 1 so if you live in the portland maine area you can see the sample in person and check out all of the great color combinations you can use with berroco s vintage chunky yarn **pattern info ** finished size approx 27 x 27 gauge 3 5 sts & 8 rws = 1 in garter st yarn approx 100 yds of bulky-weight yarn for each of 6 colors so total of 600 yds shown in vintage chunky by berroco 50% acrylic 40% wool 100g = 130 yds using the following colors color a = bilberry 61104 color b = sunny 6121 color c = breezeway 6194 color d = tang 6164 color e = clary 61103 color f = dewberry 6167 needles and other supplies 32 / 81 cm or 40 / 102 cm circular knitting needle in size us 10 5 / 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle to weave in ends 1 http //www ravelry com/shops/knitwit-yarn-shop
